divs: Sighting DetailsMy girlfriend and her kids saw a very large, brilliant oval hovering 10 feet offthe ground to their left about 150 ft. at nightfall, just after exiting Rt.50-32 onto State Rt. 139 in SE Ohio. A woman had left her car nearby and wasapproaching the object on foot. Alarmed, my friends drove away, and did notthink to mention it to me an hour later!
Summary: large brilliant object hovering 150 ft away
